name: js-layer2lib-contract-builder
description: Builds the repo contracts needed for the js-layer2lib

scripts.build: git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/SpankChain/general-state-channels.git repo && cd repo && npm i && truffle compile && mkdir -p general-state-channels/build && cp -rf build ../general-state-channels && rm -rf ../repo

author: nathan@finalitylabs.io
